nml_option.name: config_AM_pointwiseStats_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member pointwiseStats is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_pointwiseStats_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_pointwiseStats_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the pointwiseStats analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_pointwiseStats_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_pointwiseStats_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

package.description: This package includes variables required for the pointwiseStats analysis member.

dim.name: nPoints

var.name: pointCellLocalID
